headers.subject: Re: Multi-processing MPI2

body.para: There have been quite a few posts regarding issues with MPI in the forums so I would recommend searching through past posts first (MPI and MPICH2 should yeild quite a few results) which might help you diagnose and fix the problem.

But in the meantime it looks like MPI is having connection issues and there can be many reasons for this including firewalls, logins requiring passwords, Vista, and some versions of Windows requiring slightly different syntax in the config file which have all been covered in past posts.

If you have any specific questions or are still having problems after having a search through the forums then please post with some more details such as which version of Windows your using and which version of FDS 5 for starters.

quote.quotepara: I have two 4 cores PCs, the MPI2 works fine under a 1 single PC environment. But, when I linked the two PCs together and type the following command: C:\Program Files\MPICH2\bin>mpiexec.exe -file config.txt And get the wrong message as follows:

Mesh 3 of 6 is alive on ZW0179AHK1HK.asia.wspgroup.com Mesh 2 of 6 is alive on ZW0179AHK1HK.asia.wspgroup.com Mesh 1 of 6 is alive on ZW0179AHK1HK.asia.wspgroup.com Mesh 4 of 6 is alive on ZW0179AHK1HK.asia.wspgroup.com Mesh 5 of 6 is alive on ZW0182AHK1HK.asia.wspgroup.com Mesh 6 of 6 is alive on ZW0182AHK1HK.asia.wspgroup.com Fatal error in MPI_Barrier: Other MPI error, error stack: MPI_Barrier(406).............: MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD) failed MPIR_Barrier(77).............: MPIC_Sendrecv(120)...........: MPID_Isend(103)..............: failure occurred while attempting to send an eager message MPIDI_CH3_iSend(172).........: MPIDI_CH3I_Sock_connect(1191): [ch3:sock] rank 5 unable to connect to rank 0 usi ng business card <port=1144 description=ZW0179AHK1HK.asia.wspgroup.com ifname=19 2.168.1.179 > MPIDU_Sock_post_connect(1228): unable to connect to ZW0179AHK1HK.asia.wspgroup.c om on port 1144, exhausted all endpoints (errno -1) MPIDU_Sock_post_connect(1244): gethostbyname failed, The requested name is valid and was found in the database, but it does not have the correct associated data being resolved for. (errno 11004) job aborted:rank: node: exit code[: error message]
Anyone can tell me what I have done wrong? I have dedicated 6 meshes in the model with config.txt
